name: War sweet war
description:
In this game you play as a cook that got sent to help his fellow soldiers win the war by cooking delicious treats and raising morale, all while it's raining bullets and mortars from the sky.

Programming and sound made by SHOkir,

Art by Gamma (@GeneDefinitely).

This game was made for the Mini Jam 56: sky hosted by  ZahranW and KingW.
